attributes.action: to reduce vat to 5% for hairdressers, shops have large overheads
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: review vat on hairdressing we create plenty of jobs ! we cant price ourselves too high as we could lose customers and therefore put people out of work !do other labour intensive jobs have to pay vat ! no wonder some hairdressers are going out of business !

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
